body:
``` bash
==> Installing spark
==> Fetching http://mirrors.ocf.berkeley.edu/apache/spark/spark-2.0.0/spark-2.0.0-bin-without-hadoop.tgz

curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
==> Fetching from http://mirrors.ocf.berkeley.edu/apache/spark/spark-2.0.0/spark-2.0.0-bin-without-hadoop.tgz failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for spark-2.0.0-siuvjddnvh3c352byzbz3yjopqrbbsdw
```

Berkeley is taking down old versions of spark. This may be a better place for the fetcher to look.
```
http://archive.apache.org/dist/spark/
```
title: Spack cannot fetch spark
